name: AxHA
goal: AxHA facilitates support and advisory services in EU public affairs and EU projects that contribute to the societal and environmental goals of its clients.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Circular Economy, Audiovisual media, Social reporting, E-commerce, Poverty reduction, EU Urban Agenda, Privacy, Energy Efficiency, Renewable Energy, Affordable and Social Housing,State aid & SGEI,
customers: Nationale Goede Doelen Loterijen,Association of Charity Lotteries in Europe,Nationale Goede Doelen Loterijen
